human.proprioception: Aware of body position while cooking
human.interoception: Feeling of hunger or satisfaction from cooking

need1.description: Need to manage multiple cooking tasks simultaneously
need1.suggested_robot_solution: Use a kitchen timer to help manage cooking times for different dishes.

need2.description: Need to prevent burns while handling hot cookware
need2.suggested_robot_solution: Provide oven mitts to safely handle hot utensils and cookware.

need3.description: Need for efficient cooking tool management
need3.suggested_robot_solution: Organize and hand over additional cooking utensils as needed to facilitate efficient cooking.
